title: Disable new champions in ranked
body:
Anytime between 2 days and 2 weeks would work as a zone to keep the champion out of interfering in the ranked system, I remember when Sylas was released and people where first timing him in ranked and throwing the games in complete favor of the enemy teams; we limit summoner spells so that new players have the time to understand what each one does, why does this not apply to newly released champions as well?

Not everyone is an active user of the PBE Client so this would make sense, once the champion is released and people would have time to at least obtain some sort of understanding of the champions mechanics to play them on a competitive level they could play them without giving the opponents an advantage

Since Riot seeks to maintain " competitive integrity in our soloque environment, " as stated in the Summoners Code; I don't see what could go wrong in this new feature
